data.title: Trevor Thompson
authors: Yale Center for Business and the Environment
data.meta_site_name: Yale Center for Business and the Environment
data.text: Trevor is a Management Consultant with the Bridgespan Group. He graduated with an MEM and MBA from Yale in 2017. At Yale, he focused on climate change and health. He is also interested in understanding how organizations can approach and implement the planetary boundaries framework. Befor coming to Yale, Trevor worked as a professional futurist in the Washington, DC area. He did trend analyses to create forecasts and scenarios, with a primary focus on projects involving public health, health care, climate change, emerging technologies, robotics, and cyber security. Trevor graduated from Harvard University with a B.A. in Environmental Science and Public Policy, a minor in African and African-American Studies, and a Spanish language citation.
